message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to get more later!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still holding out for more!
You're getting desperate, I can see it! Take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a small chance to make it up to me!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. This is my last offer!
I'm not giving in yet, but I'll give you a tiny chance to make it up to me... barely!
